description: The MINH is the first residence in The CLUB Edition under UEM Sunrise's Happy+ Product Series. Designed with the discerning modern resident in mind, homes in The CLUB Edition offer a range of high-end features in beautifully curated hospitality-inspired environments. With its stunning architecture and sophisticated amenities, The MINH is the perfect home for those seeking an elevated lifestyle.
